title: David Bromberg - 1989 - How Late'll Ya Play 'Til_ Volume 2- Stud
description:
David Bromberg - 1989 - How Late'll Ya Play 'Til? Volume 2- Studio

It's the 1989 release of the first of the 1976 double LP, with 3 bonus tracks.

Track list:
01 - Danger Man II
02 - Get Up and Go, Fiddle Tunes
03 - Summer Wager
04 - Dallas Rag, Maple Leaf Rag
05 - Whoopee Ti Yi Yo
06 - Young Westley
07 - Dyin' Crapshooter's Blues
08 - Bluebird
09 - Idol with a Golden Head
10 - Chubby Thighs
11 - Kaatskill Serenade
Bonus tracks
12 - Kitchen Girl
13 - Long Afternoon
14 - Nashville Again
